help: -t, to             send model to other function
other unspecified options are sent to the loaded module
modules: display list of module in lib.model directory
index:path         list of module path with reference index
<index>            index of module, for module command
<path>             specific module path in lib.model directory
module: import module (last module without source) from lib.model directory
<file>             specific module file name in lib.model directory
save: save model to destination (default: model.tmp directory)
list: display list of models in model directory
index:path         list of model paths with reference index
<index>            index of model, for load command
<path>             specific model path in model directory
load: load model (last model without source) from model directory
<file>             specific model file name in model directory
init: initialize model with loaded dataset and module
fit: fit model with initialized and compiled model
to: send model path in model.tmp directory to other function
run: train the model with default setting
including initialization, creation, compile and fitting
then pass the trained model to test function
